segments.text: Please wait a moment ... here is the bill . Please check it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me , what's this item for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For three bottles of Tsingtao beer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we've can canceled one bottle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry . Let me go back to the cashier's to have it changed . ( a few minutes later , the waiter returns with the new bill . )
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry for the miscalculation . Here's the new bill . Would you mind checking it again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you're staying at our hotel , you may sign the bill .
segments.speaker: S1
